# iddoverse

## Purpose

To create analysis ready datasets (‘analysis datasets’) for researchers
using data stored in the Infectious Diseases Data Observatory (IDDO)
respoitory.

These reusable functions aim to provide a toolbox for researchers to
modify the analysis dataset to their study-specific needs, speeding up
the time it takes to create analysable datasets.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `iddoverse` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with the following code in the R console:

``` r
# uncomment below line if you have not installed 'devtools' on your machine
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Infectious-Diseases-Data-Observatory/iddoverse")
library(iddoverse)
```

We recommend re-installing regularly as the package is developing
constantly. Versions starting with ‘0.’ should be expected to change
without notification.

## Why is this useful?

The package assists researchers to transform their datasets (transferred
from IDDO), minimising the time spent on data transformation before
analysis can begin. These functions specifically work on SDTM (Study
Data Tabulation Model) data stored by IDDO. MAPPER data from IDDO is not
supported in this package.

Functions are documented and have example code. A
[vignette](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/articles/iddoverse.html)
provides a demostration/tutorial of the functions and data in the
package.

## Citation

To cite `iddoverse` in publications, see
[CITATION](https://github.com/Infectious-Diseases-Data-Observatory/iddoverse/blob/main/inst/CITATION)

## Issues

Improvements to the code are constantly being made, if you notice
errors, bugs, want to suggest improvements or have ideas for better
functionality, please describe them in
[Issues](https://github.com/Infectious-Diseases-Data-Observatory/iddoverse/issues).

## Contact

Please contact Rhys Peploe (<rhys.peploe@iddo.org> or
<rhyspeploe1998@gmail.com>) if you would like to know more, need support
or are interested in contributing to the package.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`DM_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/DM_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Demographics (DM) Domain
- [`DS_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/DS_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Disposition (DS) Domain
- [`HO_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/HO_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Healthcare Encounters (HO) Domain
- [`IN_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/IN_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Treatments and Interventions (IN) Domain
- [`LB_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/LB_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Laboratory Test Results (LB) Domain
- [`MB_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/MB_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Microbiology (MB) Domain
- [`PE_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/PE_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Physical Examination (PE) Domain
- [`PF_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/PF_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Pharmacogenomics Genetics (PF) Domain
- [`RP_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/RP_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Reproductive System Findings (RP) Domain
- [`RS_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/RS_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Disease Response and Clinical Classification (RS)
  Domain
- [`SA_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/SA_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Clinical and Adverse Events (SA) Domain
- [`TI_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/TI_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Trial Inclusion Exclusion Criteria (TI) Domain
- [`TS_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/TS_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Trial Summary (TS) Domain
- [`TV_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/TV_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Trial Visits (TV) Domain
- [`VS_RPTESTB`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/VS_RPTESTB.md)
  : IDDO-SDTM Tutorial Vital Signs (VS) Domain
- [`check_data()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/check_data.md)
  : Perform data checks on IDDO-SDTM data
- [`convert_age_to_years()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/convert_age_to_years.md)
  : Convert AGE to years.
- [`create_clinical_hist_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/create_clinical_hist_table.md)
  : Creates table of medical history features
- [`create_clinical_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/create_clinical_table.md)
  : Creates table of key clinical features
- [`create_labs_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/create_labs_table.md)
  : Create table of laboratory test results
- [`create_malaria_parasitemia_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/create_malaria_parasitemia_table.md)
  : Create table of parasitemia data specifically for malaria parasites.
- [`create_malaria_pcr_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/create_malaria_pcr_table.md)
  : Create table of malaria specific PCR data
- [`create_participant_table()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/create_participant_table.md)
  : Create table of participant details and baseline characteristics.
- [`derive_anthro_scores()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/derive_anthro_scores.md)
  : Calculate WHO growth standards using the anthro() package.
- [`prepare_domain()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/prepare_domain.md)
  : Prepare IDDO-SDTM domain for analysis
- [`table_variables()`](https://infectious-diseases-data-observatory.github.io/iddoverse/reference/table_variables.md)
  : Tabulate function to display variables in a given domain
